name: unit-measure
description: Class library for managing units of measure and conversions between unit standards.

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && nyc tap --no-timeout ./build/test/*.test.js
scripts.directTest-general: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/test/general.test.js
scripts.directTest-scenario: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/test/scenario.test.js
scripts.directTest-ratio: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/test/ratio.test.js
scripts.directTest-pickup: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/test/pickup.test.js
scripts.doc: npm run clean && npm run build && inchjs && cd build; tsccd ./; documentation readme --readme-file ../README.md --markdown-toc false --section API UnitMeasure.js

author: tremho
